CHAT.comment: AGRON KUCANA, Petitioner v. ERIC H. HOLDER, JR., ATTORNEY GENERAL
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF RICK M. SCHOENFIELD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF NICOLE A. SAHARSKY ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT IN SUPPORT OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF AMANDA C. LEITER AS AMICUS CURIAE SUPPORTING THE JUDGMENT BELOW
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF RICK M. SCHOENFIELD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:06 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
